article_title: The VA Healthcare System...a Snapshot of the U.S. Healthcare System?

article_metadata.description: In my previous post, I mention the importance of following Forbes contributors and thought leaders on the current events taking place with the Veterans Affairs (VA) healthcare system. There are a number of articles, blogs and media reports discussing the inefficiencies of the VA. It has been an interesting last [...]
